code: function insertionSort(array,arrayBars){var temp,i,j;var length=array.length;var animations=[];for(i=1;i<length;i++){for(j=i-1;j>=0;j--){animations.push(['c',j+1,j]);animations.push(['c',j+1,j]);if(array[j+1]<array[j]){animations.push(['s',j+1,j,array[j],array[j+1]]);animations.push(['s',j+1,j]);temp=array[j+1];array[j+1]=array[j];array[j]=temp;}else{break;}}}return[array,animations];}export default insertionSort;
